title: A file cannot have a reference to itself.
documentation:
When using
[Triple-Slash Directives](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/triple-slash-directives.html),
if a file references itself, this error will appear.

**test.ts**

```ts
/// <reference path="./test.ts" />
```

fixes.title: Remove the reference
fixes.body:
To fix the issue, just remove the reference. It is unnecessary as you can
already access everything in the file.
